definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: In the final exams, his average grade was above 90 points.
sentences.chinese: 他在期终考试中，科第成绩平均都在90分。

sentences.english: Last weekend , jacob and i prepared for our mid - term exams in the library.
sentences.chinese: 上周末，我和雅各一起去图书馆准备期终考。

sentences.english: Students are also required to assess their project in a final oral presentation.
sentences.chinese: 学生也需以期终口头简报方式来评估其专题。

sentences.english: The final exams are coming up. We cannot afford to waste even a minute.
sentences.chinese: 快要期终考试了，我们现在一分钟也不能浪费。

sentences.english: My final exam is next Tuesday.
The way Tom gads about, Ican't see how he will ever pass his finals.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆这样闲荡，我看他期终考试怎么也过不了关。

sentences.english: About three quarters of the students passed the final exam.
sentences.chinese: 大约有四分之三的学生期终考试及格了。

sentences.english: She failed to pass the final-term examinations.
I can still pass if I study hard for the final-term exam.
sentences.chinese: 老师要我不要放弃，只要努力我仍可通过期终考试。

sentences.english: The way Tom gads about, I can't see how he will ever pass his finals.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆这么东游西荡，我看他期终考试一定能不过。

sentences.english: Fiona was over the moon when she learned she had passed all her final exams.
sentences.chinese: 菲奥纳得知她已通过了全部的期终考试后欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: A week after learning the words, each group took a final test.
sentences.chinese: 一周后，每组都会进行一次期终考试。

sentences.english: The diagnosis is usually not made until the end of the catarrhal stage .
sentences.chinese: 诊断通常在卡他期终了前尚不能作出。

sentences.english: When will the English final term examination begin?
sentences.chinese: 英语期终考试什么时候开始？

sentences.english: The final examination will be brought forward to June instead of July.
sentences.chinese: 期终考试将由七月提前到六月举行。
妈妈，我已通过了期终考试。

definition: entrance exam for senior middle school
